edu.smu.tspell.wordnet.impl
Class RandomAccessReader

java.lang.Object
  edu.smu.tspell.wordnet.impl.RandomAccessReader
Direct Known Subclasses:
LineLocator, SynsetReader
public abstract class RandomAccessReader
extends Object

Used to access the data at arbitrary positions within a file.

Field Summary
protected static String ACCESS_MODE
          Mode in which to open the file (read-only).
protected  RandomAccessFile accessor
          Provides random access to the content of the file being read.
protected static char LINE_SEPARATOR
          Separates the lines within the file.
 
Constructor Summary
protected RandomAccessReader(File file)
          Constructs an instance of this class, specifying the file that is to be read.
 
Method Summary
protected  void finalize()
          Called by the garbage collector when it's about to reclaim the memory associated with this object.
protected  RandomAccessFile getAccessor()
          Returns a reference to the file reader used to access the file.
protected  long getFilePointer()
          Returns a reference to the current file pointer value.
protected  long getFileSize()
          Returns the number of bytes in the file being read.
protected  char readNextCharacter()
          Reads the next sequential character from the file.
protected  String readToNextEndOfLine()
          Beginning with the current / next character in the file, read until we encounter either the line delimiter or the end of the file and return the characters (excluding the delimiter) that were read.
protected  void seek(long newPosition)
          Moves the file pointer to a new position and records that position so that it's available for quick retrieval.

Method Detail

seek

protected void seek(long newPosition)
             throws IOException
Moves the file pointer to a new position and records that position so that it's available for quick retrieval.

Parameters:
newPosition - New byte position within the file.
Throws:
IOException - An error occurred updating the file pointer.

readToNextEndOfLine

protected String readToNextEndOfLine()
                              throws IOException
Beginning with the current / next character in the file, read until we encounter either the line delimiter or the end of the file and return the characters (excluding the delimiter) that were read.

Returns:
Characters read from the file position at entry until a line delimiter or the end of the file was encountered.
Throws:
IOException - An error occurred reading the file.

readNextCharacter

protected char readNextCharacter()
                          throws IOException
Reads the next sequential character from the file.

Returns:
Next character in the file or -1 if reached end-of-file.
Throws:
IOException - An error occurred reading the character.
See Also:
RandomAccessFile.read()

getAccessor

protected RandomAccessFile getAccessor()
Returns a reference to the file reader used to access the file.

Returns:
Random access file reader.

getFileSize

protected long getFileSize()
Returns the number of bytes in the file being read.

Returns:
Number of bytes in the file being read.

getFilePointer

protected long getFilePointer()
Returns a reference to the current file pointer value.

Returns:
Current file pointer value.

finalize

protected void finalize()
                 throws Throwable
Called by the garbage collector when it's about to reclaim the memory associated with this object.

We use this opportunity to close the file that was being read; otherwise the file would remain open until the JVM exited.

Throws:
Throwable
